Articles.Content:
Well I donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know about you, but after so many years, I am certainly hyped for the long awaited 1.0 release of Kerbal Space Program. However, I realized something the other day while discussing the finer points of Kerbal Lawn Darts with a buddy*. One of the big features coming with 1.0 is the aerodynamics overhaul. We calculated that the current compliment of Hype Trains are not designed for this new pancake-punishing feature, and will not be able to maintain the proper Hype velocity with their blunt profiles. I have tackled this problem (with some help*), and after much time and more program crashes than I can count, I think the solution is satisfactory.

*Otterer is also a member of the forums, but is more of a lurker. He gave me advice, helped put the video together, did most of the editing, and did the music. He even used (part of) one of his own songs: White Waters!

And so, without further ado, I unveil to you, the NEW, the 100% STOCK, the AERODYNAMICALLY streamlined for MAXIMUM HYPE, the one, the only, the Hype Train Express 1.0! (Video, download link and rest of Album at bottom).

Handcrafted using the latest and greatest 1940Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s fluid dynamics engineering, the Hype Train Express 1.0 is a much needed relief for some of our older Hype Trains.

As you can see, no detail has been left out for the Hype Train Express 1.0. From a detailed cabin interior;

To realistic handling and performance capabilities of a steam locomotive;

And of course it just wouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be Kerbal if it didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t explode at the slightest provocation. And boasting over 600 parts for the Locomotive and Tender, you can be sure they are top quality explosions.

Furthermore, as a special offer, the Hype Train Express 1.0 now comes with a complete starter set of Passenger Cars! You can now kill carry HUNDREDS of Kerbals with you as we travel along.

Hype Train Express 1.0 Passenger Car Starter Set Includes: Coach Car, Bilevel Car, Dining car, & Observation Car.

(Water tower not included!)

WhatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s that? Not enough? Well now introducing the Hype Train Express 1.0 passenger car expansion set! You can now k carry over 900.0 kerbals! Guaranteed to satisfy all your hype train needs, or we will give you a second Hype Train Express 1.0 free of charge!

*Hype Train Express 1.0 passenger car expansion set Includes: Lounge Car, Sleeping Car, Dome Car, Hospital Car, Combine Car,

(*not yet available for commercial use.)

But wait! There is more! Download now, and we will throw in a free Hoopla Puff Jr. (Complete with detailed interior.)

Now available in kerbalpamorphic form!

(It scares me too)

It turns out Hype is very Flammable..

Here is the video:

.

.

.

And the rest of the photo album: (Imbedding the album isn't working for some reason, but the link is still good.)

http://imgur.com/a/Bhr1X

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download Links:

http://kerbalx.com/Ival70/Hype-Train-Express-10

http://kerbalx.com/Ival70/Hoopla-Puff-Jr

So get Hyped for 1.0 today! (Because this is the last day to get hyped,1.0 comes out today.)

Edited April 29, 2015 by Ival70
Added download

Congrats on your 100th post!

Glad we could finally get this finished!
You made my day. Thank you very much!

Normally all this hype misery doesn't interest me. But I must admit, those trains do look pretty good.

But why ruin an otherwise good looking video with that horrible 1980's atari music?
I heard some Ozzy osbourne in there
Nice hype train!
That is the best damn (hype)train I have ever seen.

Any video that combines Thomas the Tank engine and Crazytrain is a winner in my book.

Going off the rails on the HypeTrain!
Now I want to make a flying train. Darn You Ival70!!
My god man! The tiny train is amazing!!! So adorable. Great work on the big one too. It looks great!
It's Perfect!
I am mesmerized.
That is truly amazing. And all stock, too. Great job, sir.

I want this. So badly.

HYPE!

This is the reason why I like the KSP forums.

Tiem to give someone here rep.
Not since Tizwaz gave away Black Sabbath albums to the under-8s' art competition winners have I been so impressed.

Awsome!!

The music at 1:30 ish was cool... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ...

PLEASE can there be a download?
Pleasepleasepleasepleaseplease post craft files??
That is just great!
I would love to see how long it would last falling through the atmosphere after the new update!

Thanks guys! I'll see if I can figure out how to post the .craft files. If anyone has any advice on how to do that, I'd certainly appreciate it. Also, let's not forget Otterer, who helped a lot. By the way, The music used for the video was (in order of use) White Waters, Thomas The Tank Engine Theme, White Waters (again), Orange Blossom Special, and Crazy Train.

"You cannot give Reputation to the same post twice."

.......
put them on google drive or mediafire
Both trains are works of art IMHO. Very, very cool.
I believe you can post crafts directly to KerbalX.
